title: Red Wine of Rapture
description: "The blood of life."Fern's new employer, Simon Wingate, used the phrase when he talked about wine. Fern had come to Wingate House in search of her twin sister and stayed on to type the manuscript of Simon's latest book. She soon found herself falling in love with her handsome employer, but romance gave way to terror when she learned the horrible significance of Simon's book and the grisly secret of the wine cellar in the basement of Wingate House!
author: Margaret Worth
